text: @SpeakerPelosi This is just another vengeful act by THE IMPEACHED DOTARD ORANGE BLOB.  THE IDOB is getting ready to do what Erodgan of Turkey did and now Orban of Hungary (Coronavirus kills its first democracy). If people don't think IDOB IS THINKING ABOUT DOING THIS then they are clueless.
